00016 MemoryBlockData::MemoryBlockData(General::Usage usage,
00017                                                                  General::BooleanValue volatileValue,
00018                                                                  General::Access access, const QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> >&
00019                                                                  parameters):
00020 usage_(usage), volatile_(volatileValue),
00021 access_(access), parameters_(parameters) {
00022 }
00023 
00024 MemoryBlockData::MemoryBlockData( const MemoryBlockData& other ):
00025 usage_(other.usage_),
00026 volatile_(other.volatile_),
00027 access_(other.access_),
00028 parameters_() {
00029 
00030         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00031                 if (param) {
00032                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00033                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00034                         parameters_.append(copy);
00035                 }
00036         }
00037 }
00038 
00039 MemoryBlockData& MemoryBlockData::operator=( const MemoryBlockData& other ) {
00040         if (this != &other) {
00041                 usage_ = other.usage_;
00042                 volatile_ = other.volatile_;
00043                 access_ = other.access_;
00044 
00045                 parameters_.clear();
00046                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00047                         if (param) {
00048                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00049                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00050                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00051                         }
00052                 }
00053         }
00054         return *this;
00055 }
00056 
00057 MemoryBlockData::~MemoryBlockData() {
00058         parameters_.clear();
00059 }
00060 
00061 void MemoryBlockData::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00062         // if usage is defined
00063         if (usage_ != General::UNSPECIFIED_USAGE) {
00064                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:usage", General::usage2Str(usage_));
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (volatile_ != General::BOOL_UNSPECIFIED) {
00068                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:volatile",
00069                                 General::booleanValue2Str(volatile_));
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (access_ != General::UNSPECIFIED_ACCESS) {
00073                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:access", General::access2Str(access_));
00074         }
00075 
00076         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00077                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00078 
00079                 // go through each parameter
00080                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00081                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00085         }
00086 }

00117 void MemoryBlockData::setParameters(
